VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: unstable
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject’s brain has become highly tuned to psychic wavelengths, making them vulnerable to Mechanoid psychic attacks but also a far more capable psycaster.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: extremely flammable
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject’s entire body has become highly flammable, with the slightest spark being able to send them bursting into flames.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: toxin intolerance
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject’s organs are constantly lacking certain minerals (e.g. Iodine) and freely absorb them from the air, even if they're irradiated or bound to toxic chemicals.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: heat intolerance
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject can no longer sweat properly, meaning they overheat very easily as their body can no longer cool itself. This lowers their maximum comfortable temperature by 10 degrees.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: cold intolerance
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject’s muscles no longer shiver involuntarily, meaning they can no longer warm themselves when exposed to cold temperatures. This raises their minimum comfortable temperature by 10 degrees.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: immunological disorder
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject’s immune system has been ruined, requiring them to take frequent medicine and receive constant medical care, as even the sniffles could kill them.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: hypermetabolism
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject’s metabolism has gone into overdrive, requiring them to eat twice as much food as they did before even if they don’t need that much extra energy.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: finicky
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject has become incredibly fussy, demanding they pay extraneous attention to the most inconsequential of tasks and taking three times longer than usual.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: unsure
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject has become incredibly doubtful and suffers frequent dizzy spells, taking twice as long to acquire targets with their weapons as they re-check that they’re ready to fire.

VFEAncients.PowerDef.label: always knows better
VFEAncients.PowerDef.description: The subject has developed a somewhat misplaced sense of pride due to their gene therapy and refuses to learn anything new, stating that they know better than everyone and no one can improve perfection.
